list.title: Allspeak
list.text: The universal language known by most civilized peoples, it is a harmonious blend of words and expressions drawn from various cultures, offering a common ground for communication.

list.title: Elvish
list.text: The common language of elves, spoken with a grace and intertwined lyrical tones.

list.title: Dwarvish
list.text: The language of dwarves and others who share their culture. Dwarvish is a robust and resonant tongue, usually spoken loud enough to be heard over the rhythmic clinks of hammers and chisels.

list.title: Thistletongue
list.text: The language of faeries and other fae folk. Thistletongue is ethereal, filled with delicate trills and melodic nuances.

list.title: Starrend
list.text: The language of celestials as well as some air elementals and other sky dwellers. Starrend is a celestial tongue, each word carrying the weight of cosmic forces, and is characterized by crystalline tones and etherial echoes.

list.title: Deeproot
list.text: The language of Ents and Stone Colossi. It's a deep and slow language for deep and slow creatures. Deeproot rumbles like the earth, each word a deliberate and ancient utterance resonating with the solidity of stone.

list.title: Seawhisper
list.text: A fluid and melodic language spoken by merfolk and other denizens of the ocean. Seawhisper uses clicks and sharp bursts of noise and can only properly be spoken under water.

list.title: Voidhowl
list.text: Spoken by demons and other infernal beings.  Voidhowl is a cacophony of malevolent sounds, mixing guttural growling and ear-splitting shrieks.

rules.title: Damage Types
rules.text: Bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, fire, cold, lightning, rot, radiant, & psychic

list.title: Incapacitated
list.text: You cannot take actions or move and are unaware of your surroundings.

list.title: Dying
list.text: 0 Health. See the Dead & Dying rules for more information.

list.title: Dead
list.text: 0 Health and 0 Stamina. See the Dead & Dying rules for more information.

list.title: Blind
list.text: You cannot see. All attacks have misfortune and attacks against you gain fortune's favor.

list.title: Deaf
list.text: You cannot hear. You have Misfortune on all tests to stealth or notice something sneaking up on you.

list.title: Entangled
list.text: Your speed is reduced to 0.

list.title: Pinned
list.text: Your speed is reduced to 0, you have misfortune on all attacks and spellcasting tests.

list.title: Exhausted
list.text: You cannot spend stamina, your Speed is reduced by half and your attacks deal half damage.

list.title: Hidden
list.text: You cannot be seen and gain a +3 to attack tests while hidden. Attacking or casting.

list.title: Prone
list.text: Your speed is reduced by 20ft to a minimum of 5ft. Ranged attacks against you have Misfortune while melee attacks have Fortune's Favor.

list.title: Hindered
list.text: Your speed is halved.
